alert.note: Alert for Rutherford; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 8:57PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Rutherford and south central Wilson Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 857 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walterhill, or near Murfreesboro, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Walterhill and Lascassas. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 82 and 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for Middle Tennessee.
